title: Textile, 1968-110-103, 1920s
description: Polychrome block print. Vase of brightly colored flowers in yellow, red, lavender, set in a grey diamond that is placed in a checkerboard pattern of green and black stripes, blue and black bands. Pattern repeats in rows of alternate alignment. Condition: soiled. Color dots at selvage; black "J" stamped on selvage.
